entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 08:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
